document.full_text: a church-sponsored study on wednesday blamed poorly trained priests and a deviant society for the roman catholic church's sex abuse crisis, but victims dismissed it as a whitewash of an institutional coverup.
document.title: critics slam study that us priest abuse in the past
lines_and_colors: a church-sponsored study on wednesday blamed poorly trained priests and a deviant society for the roman catholic church's sex abuse crisis, but victims dismissed it as a whitewash of an institutional coverup.
